name: Mighty monsters
description:
Mighty monsters is a 2 player fighting game. 

The game is pretty much straight forward but incase you don't understand it then i'll explain:

  • First player 1 picks their team of 4.  
  • Then player 2 picks their team of 4
  • Then the battle begins
  • The monster which has the turn will be highlighted in yellow. 
  • The player picks one of the moves shown below and clicks on the monster they wanna use it on! (You can also use moves on yourself. Careful friendly fire and sucide is on!)
  • The loser is the person who's team dies first!
